name: A Hoppy Walk
body:
After a rough night in your favorite watering hole it's time to go home.

Your feet are on autopilot but you have to balance yourself while staying hydrated. Make sure you don't run out of drinks and you stay on the road. Watch out for those pesky birds and banana peels!

All assets were created by us during the jam.

Features multiple endings!

## Controls
Left/right arrows OR A/D - Move left/right  
Q - Pause menu

event.name: Ludum Dare 49
event.body:
Hey everyone! It's time for **Ludum Dare 49**!

With [the impossible event](/events/ludum-dare/48/) now behind us, it's time to start preparing for the future. We had some big news to announce back in August **([we're hiring](/events/ludum-dare/48/$233336/ludum-dare-is-hiring-a-senior-developer-in-canada))**, and there's more to follow in the coming days. Check out **[the news](/news)** for the latest.

Things to know about this event:

* This will be a [regular **Jam/Compo** event](/events/ludum-dare/rules)
* It's an October event, so it start 3 hours earlier than you might be used to. See the time above.
* **NEW**: The "Play and Rate" games period will be shorter! It'll end on Thursday October 21st, or just over 2 weeks after the event ends, _instead_ of the usual 3 weeks.

#### Resources
 
* :closed_book: **Rules**: [/ludum-dare/rules](/events/ludum-dare/rules)
* :green_book: **Game Hosting Guide**: [/ludum-dare/hosting-guide](/events/ludum-dare/hosting-guide)
* :ballot_box: **Themes**: [/49/theme](/events/ludum-dare/49/theme)
* :tv: **Keynote**: [Jupiter Hadley](/events/ludum-dare/49/$258334/welcome-to-ludum-dare-49)
* :gift: **Deals and Promos**: [Ludum Deals 49](/events/ludum-dare/49/$258334/ludum-deals-49)
